item.title: Homework
item.description: A fitting meme | attribution: https://twitter.com/designuxui/status/490179377099845632 Now it’s your turn! We’ve layed out the basics of how to get the source code and spin up a working development environment, but like most things — the devil is in the details ðŸ˜„. In preparation for tomorrow, I’d like you to pick a Python package and try setting up a development environment! You can choose whichever package you’d like - I’d recommend maybe choosing one that you use often (e.
